page.title: 13 Transport
page.content: This is a very isolated area with few roads. In the past the four villages were well served with regular bus services and a rail link. Today the railway has gone and the bus services have been greatly reduced. Many of the older ladies complained that they felt trapped in the village. A lot of the blame was put on the newcomers because they all worked out of the village and had their own transport. This has cut down the number of people using the bus service which as a result meant a cut in service.
